item.description:
We're having a big party the night before we open for real so all our climber friends can come hang out and see everything before anyone else gets to.

We're also going out of our minds with an insane deal on yearly memberships... only $199! The big restriction is just that you have to buy it at the party. A deal this hot, we can only hold onto it for a few hours before we catch fireeeeee! And seriously, it'd be irresponsible for you to NOT buy one at this price...

There will be give-aways, food & beer, a DJ, maybe some bands and whatever other fun ideas I can come up with!

Oh, and you can climb too I guess.

-Matt
item.name: City Climb Preview Party
